Classes in com.code.aon.common used by com.code.aon.common
AonException
          The class AonException and its subclasses are a form of Throwable that indicates conditions that a reasonable AON application might want to catch.
BasicFinderBean
          Basic implementation of the IFinderBean class.
IFinderBean
          Interface that allows search operations over the entities of the model.
IManagerBean
          Interface that allows operations such as create, read, update and delete, over the entities of the model.
ITransferObject
          Base class of any component in the Aon-Framework plataform.
ManagerBeanException
          The class ManagerBeanException indicates conditions created by a IManagerBean that a reasonable AON application might want to catch.
